title: THOUGHT / SORRY COP
description:
Suggestion tells you all about being a Sorry Cop.

... I am SORRY!!! Sorry for everything! Sorry for being *me*!

dialogueTree.title: Suggestion: "Hey, so we've been monitoring you i..."
dialogueTree.text: Hey, so we've been monitoring you internally, and now we know your *copotype*.

links.title: You: "Wait, there are *copotypes*?"
links.text: Wait, there are *copotypes*?

links.title: Suggestion: "Yes. Guess what's yours?"
links.text: Yes. Guess what's yours?

links.title: You: "Cool cop?"
links.text: Cool cop?

links.title: Suggestion: "No, you're the *Sorry Cop*. The cop..."
links.text: No, you're the *Sorry Cop*. The cop who's sorriest. Let's make it official, then, shall we?

links.title: Empathy: "Huge lack of enthusiasm going on in..."
links.text: Huge lack of enthusiasm going on in here.

links.title: You: "Okay, okay, but what are the *other..."
links.text: Okay, okay, but what are the *other* copotypes?

links.title: Suggestion: "Oh, you know. Apocalypse, Superstel..."
links.text: Oh, you know. Apocalypse, Superstellar, The Advanced Interesting Cop. Liquid Shadow Cop. But you're too sorry to say those things, so -- here we go?

links.title: You: "Uhm, won't the other copotypes be j..."
links.text: Uhm, won't the other copotypes be jealous?

links.title: Suggestion: "What? Jealous of the *Sorry Cop*? I..."
links.text: What? Jealous of the *Sorry Cop*? I think they'll be fine. Don't worry.

links.title: Conceptualization: "They'll be super, super fine. It'll..."
links.text: They'll be super, super fine. It'll be totally *okay*. You can dual-copotype from sorry to anything.

links.title: You: "I'm sorry. (Opt in.)"
links.text: I'm sorry. (Opt in.)

links.title: Suggestion: "Of course you are. It's okay. See i..."
links.text: Of course you are. It's okay. See if you can get something out of this. Like... info, or... maybe every time you say you're sorry you get a million bucks?

links.title: Logic: "That won't happen."
links.text: That won't happen.

links.title: You: "You know, actually I'm *not* sorry...."
links.text: You know, actually I'm *not* sorry. I change my mind.

links.title: Suggestion: "No, you don't. C'mon. You'll be bac..."
links.text: No, you don't. C'mon. You'll be back to saying sorry in two minutes. Stop wasting time and begin The Repentance.

links.title: You: "Fuckin'... *they* should be sorry!"
links.text: Fuckin'... *they* should be sorry!

links.title: Suggestion: "Yes-yes, impotent rage and lamentat..."
links.text: Yes-yes, impotent rage and lamentation. Let's wrap it up?

links.title: You: "No. I'm *really* not sorry. Fuck of..."
links.text: No. I'm *really* not sorry. Fuck off! (Opt out.)

links.title: Suggestion: "Wow. Okay. *Fuck off*? Maybe we wer..."
links.text: Wow. Okay. *Fuck off*? Maybe we were wrong about you then...

links.title: Half Light: "Check out the big balls on Fire Cop..."
links.text: Check out the big balls on Fire Cop...

links.title: You: "Some kind of... weapon-cop?"
links.text: Some kind of... weapon-cop?

links.title: You: "Sorry cop? I'm sorry, I'm not sure...."
links.text: Sorry cop? I'm sorry, I'm not sure...

links.title: Suggestion: "Yes. Sorry Cop. The cop who's sorri..."
links.text: Yes. Sorry Cop. The cop who's sorriest. Let's make it official, then, shall we?

links.title: You: "I'm sorry you had to monitor me."
links.text: I'm sorry you had to monitor me.

links.title: Suggestion: "Okay, just for the length of this s..."
links.text: Okay, just for the length of this short demonstration, please say something that isn't *I'm sorry*. Guess. What is it?

links.title: You: "I was kinda hoping I'm the Apocalyp..."
links.text: I was kinda hoping I'm the Apocalypse Cop.

links.title: Suggestion: "That is only a ludicrous daydream...."
links.text: That is only a ludicrous daydream. Guess again. You're the...

links.title: You: "I was kinda hoping I'm the Supersta..."
links.text: I was kinda hoping I'm the Superstar Cop.

links.title: You: "I was kinda thinking I'm the Regula..."
links.text: I was kinda thinking I'm the Regular Cop.

links.title: You: "Okay. What am I?"
links.text: Okay. What am I?

links.title: Suggestion: "Guess."
links.text: Guess.

links.title: You: "[Discard thought.]"
links.text: [Discard thought.]
